q1: How can I increase intimacy with my language exchange partner?
a1: To increase intimacy, share your interests and hobbies and meet regularly. Sending a congratulatory message or gift on your friend's birthday or special day is also a good method. It's also important to maintain honest and open communication to build trust.
q2: What is the most effective way to find a language exchange partner?
a2: The most effective way to find a language exchange partner is to use language exchange apps or websites. These platforms allow you to set your language and the language you want to learn to find matching partners. You can also use online language exchange communities or social media to find partners. Joining groups that share your interests or activities is also a good method.
q3: I want to turn off the camera and mute during a video call.
a3: In the video chat room, click the camera icon under your video screen to turn the camera on and off, and click the microphone icon to mute or unmute the microphone.
q4: How can I resolve difficulties that may arise during conversations with my language exchange partner?
a4: To resolve difficulties during conversations, first consider each other's language level and understanding. If there are parts you don't understand, respectfully and clearly ask for a re-explanation. You can also use translation tools provided by language exchange apps or websites to aid understanding. Finally, it is important to solve problems with a positive attitude and encourage each other.
q5: What expressions are frequently used when exchanging languages with foreign friends?
a5: Common expressions used in language exchange include 'What language are you learning?', 'What is your native language?', 'How long have you been studying this language?' and so on. Expressions like 'Can you understand what I am saying?' to check understanding are also frequently used.
q6: What are some ways to keep conversations with a language exchange partner interesting and beneficial?
a6: To keep conversations interesting and beneficial, discuss various topics and learn about each other's cultures. Sharing videos or photos to lead the conversation through visual materials and interacting through games or quizzes are also good methods. Most importantly, be genuinely curious and interested in the other person's story.
q7: Is there a way to add friends while video chatting?
a7: In the video chat room, click the + icon under your friend's video screen to add a friend.
q8: I want to communicate with local friends~
a8: We are discussing a feature to communicate with nearby friends by entering the current region. We will inform you of any additional updates.
